title: Build Karani Sena Yuva Shakti organization website

requirements.text: Create a home page with a hero section displaying the organization logo and name 'Karani Sena Yuva Shakti'
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is prominently displayed at the top of the home page
Organization logo is clearly visible in the hero section
Organization name 'Karani Sena Yuva Shakti' is displayed alongside the logo

requirements.text: Implement a photo gallery section on the home page that displays multiple photos uploaded by admins
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays all photos uploaded by admins
Photos are arranged in a responsive grid or carousel layout
Gallery is visually integrated into the home page design

requirements.text: Add an organization news and messages section on the home page that displays posts created by admins
acceptanceCriteria: News section displays all published news posts
Each news post shows title and content
News posts are displayed in reverse chronological order (newest first)

requirements.text: Create an admission form page with fields for: full name, complete address, email, date of birth, and mobile number
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes input fields for full name, complete address, email, date of birth, and mobile number
All fields have appropriate input types (text, email, date, tel)
Form has clear labels for each field
Form includes a submit button

requirements.text: Add a photo upload field to the admission form where candidates can upload their own photo
acceptanceCriteria: Photo upload field accepts image files
Upload field has clear instructions for candidates
Preview of uploaded photo is shown before submission

requirements.text: Store all admission form submissions in the backend database, including candidate details and uploaded photo
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores full name, complete address, email, date of birth, mobile number, and photo for each submission
Each submission has a unique identifier
Photo data is stored as binary or reference

requirements.text: Create an admin panel protected by Internet Identity authentication that allows admins to log in securely
acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel is only accessible after Internet Identity authentication
Unauthenticated users are redirected to login
Admin panel has a logout option

requirements.text: Implement admin functionality to view and manage all admission form submissions in the admin panel
acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel displays a list of all admission submissions
Each submission shows candidate name, contact details, date of birth, and photo
Admins can view full details of each submission

requirements.text: Add admin functionality to upload, view, and delete multiple photos for the home page gallery
acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel has an interface to upload new photos to the gallery
Admin can view all uploaded gallery photos
Admin can delete photos from the gallery
Gallery photos are stored in the backend

requirements.text: Implement admin functionality to create, edit, and delete organization news and message posts
acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel has a form to create new news posts with title and content
Admin can edit existing news posts
Admin can delete news posts
News posts are stored in the backend and displayed on the home page

requirements.text: Design the website with a visually cohesive theme using warm, traditional colors (saffron, deep red, gold accents) with clean typography and culturally respectful layout patterns appropriate for a youth organization
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses warm, traditional tones that reflect organizational values
Typography is readable and professional
Layout is clean and organized across all pages
Visual design is consistent throughout the application

constraints: Admin panel must be protected with Internet Identity authentication
All admission form submissions must be stored in the backend database
Photo uploads must be handled securely for both admission forms and gallery

required: Karani Sena Yuva Shakti organization logo with traditional Indian youth organization emblems and saffron/red color scheme (ksys-logo.dim_400x400.png)
Hero background image with subtle traditional Indian patterns in warm tones (hero-bg.dim_1920x600.png)
